name: part_009
file: tmp_Rushia's last birthday stream るしあさんの最後の誕生日配信 【#潤羽るしあ生誕祭】祝３D LIVE！！with３期生☆【潤羽るしあ-ホロライブ】 [3gRxbBWZAPc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section where the 3rd generation members discuss their next song choice, with Pekora teasing the audience.
Performance of 'Interact Fantasia' by the Hololive 3rd Generation.

subtitles.original: そうじゃないの！
subtitles.english: That's not it!

subtitles.original: さぁさぁさぁ！
subtitles.english: Come on, come on!

subtitles.original: おとぶんとか...
subtitles.english: Like 'Otobun'...

subtitles.original: ねえ！
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: ５人だからね、イッツ・ア・ミュージックもね、歌いたかったね！
subtitles.english: Since there are five of us, we wanted to sing 'It's a Music' too!

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあもね、歌いたいぺこだね！
subtitles.english: We want to sing 'Interact Fantasia' too, peko!

subtitles.original: 歌いたい！歌いたい！
subtitles.english: I want to sing it! I want to sing it!

subtitles.original: ほら、ほら、ほら！
subtitles.english: Look, look, look!

subtitles.original: あ、焼肉！
subtitles.english: Ah, Yakiniku!

subtitles.original: うわあああああ！
subtitles.english: Whoaaa!

subtitles.original: 歌ったね、焼肉。
subtitles.english: We did sing 'Yakiniku'.

subtitles.original: ほらもう！ぺこらいっちゃって！
subtitles.english: Come on! Pekora, go ahead and say it!

subtitles.original: いっちゃっていいぺこですか？しかも正解いっちゃうよ？いい？
subtitles.english: Can I say it, peko? And I'll give the right answer, okay? Ready?

subtitles.original: うん！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: いくよ！
subtitles.english: Here I go!

subtitles.original: ぺこらガチでいっちゃうよ？いいの？本当に？
subtitles.english: Pekora's really gonna say it? Is it okay? Truly?

subtitles.original: 分かるかなぁ？
subtitles.english: I wonder if they'll know?

subtitles.original: え、待って、他に５人で歌った曲ってなんかあったっけ？
subtitles.english: Wait, were there any other songs we sang as five?

subtitles.original: もうー！！
subtitles.english: Jeez!!

subtitles.original: ななびょうし！
subtitles.english: Seven beats!

subtitles.original: ななびょ... せーの！
subtitles.english: Seven bea... one, two!

subtitles.original: なびょ！
subtitles.english: Nabyo!

subtitles.original: うん！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 並んでからぺこ、並んでからな！うん、よっ！
subtitles.english: Line up first, peko! Line up! Yeah, alright!

subtitles.original: いきます！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあ！
subtitles.english: Interact Fantasia!

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあ
subtitles.english: Interact Fantasia

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあ / Lyric / Music: 渡辺翔
subtitles.english: Interact Fantasia / Lyric / Music: Sho Watanabe

subtitles.original: いんたらくと
subtitles.english: Interact...

subtitles.original: ふぁんたじあ
subtitles.english: Fantasia...

subtitles.original: いんたらくと、ふぁんたじあ、いんたらくと、ふぁんたじあ！
subtitles.english: Interact, Fantasia, Interact, Fantasia!

subtitles.original: そうワクワク止まらないね、いんたらくとふぁんたじあ
subtitles.english: That excitement just won't stop, Interact Fantasia

subtitles.original: Wake up fantasia、きっとここが消えないフェアリーテイル
subtitles.english: Wake up fantasia, this will surely be an everlasting fairy tale

subtitles.original: Wake up fantasia、レッツ・ゴー、イェイ！
subtitles.english: Wake up fantasia, let's go, yay!

subtitles.original: ぺこら！
subtitles.english: Pekora!

subtitles.original: だんだん目指すは頂点だ、ほらついてくるぺこ
subtitles.english: Aiming higher step by step to the peak, hey, follow me, peko

subtitles.original: るしあ！
subtitles.english: Rushia!

subtitles.original: ちょっと待ってみんなで一緒に、ねぇなんか頼りなくない？
subtitles.english: Wait a minute, all of us together, hey, isn't something missing?

subtitles.original: ふれあ！
subtitles.english: Flare!

subtitles.original: 怖いものなし進めいざ舞え
subtitles.english: Nothing to fear, advance and dance now

subtitles.original: のえる！
subtitles.english: Noel!

subtitles.original: たまには泣いちゃっても前向いていく
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry sometimes, just keep looking forward

subtitles.original: まりん！
subtitles.english: Marine!

subtitles.original: あはーい、さて手を取り合ったら冒険の幕が開ける
subtitles.english: Ahoy! Now, once we take each other's hands, the curtain rises on adventure

subtitles.original: たちまち過ぎてゆく昨日、その目に焼き付け
subtitles.english: Yesterday's fading away in an instant, burn it into your eyes

subtitles.original: 広がる空も海も大地も、重ねあった思い出を溢れさせ
subtitles.english: The vast sky, the sea, and the land, let the shared memories overflow

subtitles.original: 明日へと走り続けよう
subtitles.english: And keep running towards tomorrow

subtitles.original: 果てしない夢を追う真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: Chasing an endless dream, straight ahead

subtitles.original: 君となら怖くはないから
subtitles.english: Because I'm not afraid if I'm with you

subtitles.original: 戸惑いも全部その背中に預けあい
subtitles.english: Entrusting even all our hesitation to each other's backs

subtitles.original: 未知の道も楽しみながら走れる
subtitles.english: Even unknown paths, we can run while enjoying them

subtitles.original: 心が今を告げる、さあ行くよ
subtitles.english: My heart announces the present, let's go

subtitles.original: 進むべき未来が待っている
subtitles.english: The future we should head towards is waiting

subtitles.original: 他でもない君がいるから
subtitles.english: Because you are here, and no one else

subtitles.original: 繋げよう君と僕の世界、ここから旅は始まってる
subtitles.english: Let's connect your world and mine, the journey starts right here

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあ、きっとここが消えないフェアリーテイル
subtitles.english: Interact Fantasia, this will surely be an everlasting fairy tale

subtitles.original: Wake up fantasia、レッツ・ゴー、イェイ！
subtitles.english: Wake up fantasia, let's go, yay!

subtitles.original: 目触れ、ハローエバー、して日常を照らし出すトゥインクル・ウェザー
subtitles.english: Gazing, hello ever, twinkle weather that lights up everyday life

subtitles.original: 退屈にバイバイ、声上げ明日へ付いて来れるよね？トゥワイス・ア・デイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye to boredom, raise your voice to tomorrow, you can follow me, right? Twice a day!

subtitles.original: 今駆け出す時が来た、心の準備はオッケー？
subtitles.english: The time to dash out has come, is your heart ready?

subtitles.original: 鐘を鳴らせば伝説が一歩開く
subtitles.english: If we ring the bell, a legend will open up step by step

subtitles.original: 僅かに踏み出した勇気が魔法に変わるから
subtitles.english: Because the little courage we took will turn into magic

subtitles.original: 世界の果ても次元の壁も、吹き飛ばして今君に会いにいこう
subtitles.english: Whether the ends of the world or dimensional walls, let's blow them away and go see you now

subtitles.original: 一緒に飛び出してみない？
subtitles.english: Won't you try jumping out together with us?

subtitles.original: 届かない夢はないどこへでも
subtitles.english: There's no dream that can't be reached, to anywhere

subtitles.original: 君となら辿り着けるから
subtitles.english: Because I can reach it if I'm with you

subtitles.original: 褪せないエールをその両手に握りしめ
subtitles.english: Gripping an unfading cheer in both of those hands

subtitles.original: 白紙の地図を描きまわして駆け出そう
subtitles.english: Let's draw on a blank map and dash out

subtitles.original: 願いとともに歌う聞こえるよ
subtitles.english: Singing along with our wishes, I can hear it

subtitles.original: まやかしのファンタジーであっても
subtitles.english: Even if it's a deceptive fantasy

subtitles.original: 出会いは幻じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because our meeting is not an illusion

subtitles.original: 繋げよう君と僕の声、奇跡を奏で合うシンフォニー、いつまでも
subtitles.english: Let's connect your voice and mine, a symphony playing miracles together, forever

subtitles.original: ちょっと強くなりたくて
subtitles.english: Wanting to become a little stronger

subtitles.original: ずっと笑い合いたくて
subtitles.english: Wanting to always laugh together

subtitles.original: 色づく気持ち今結ぶ、君と出会えたよ
subtitles.english: Binding these budding feelings now, I was able to meet you

subtitles.original: 失敗も後悔もさせるわけないよ
subtitles.english: I won't let there be failures or regrets

subtitles.original: だって毎日楽しすぎでしょ？
subtitles.english: Because every day is just too fun, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ときめきの先の先へ
subtitles.english: Towards what lies beyond the excitement

subtitles.original: 裸足で駆け抜けろ
subtitles.english: Run through it barefoot

subtitles.original: いんたらくと、ふぁんたじあ、いんたらくと、ふぁんたじあ！行こう！
subtitles.english: Interact, Fantasia, Interact, Fantasia! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 果てしない夢を追う真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: Chasing an endless dream, straight ahead

subtitles.original: 君となら怖くはないから
subtitles.english: Because I'm not afraid if I'm with you
